sense.gloss: to draw back, to sink, to cave in
to be set back (e.g. from a road)
to withdraw (e.g. from the public eye), to retire to (somewhere), to stay indoors, to butt out, to stay out of it

sdata.j: ↑無理↑↓むり↓が↑通↑↓とお↓れば↑道理↑↓どうり↓が↑引↑↓|ひ↓っ↑込↑↓こ↓む|。
↑無理↑↓むり↓が↑通↑↓とお↓れば、↑道理↑↓どうり↓が↑引↑↓|ひ↓っ↑込↑↓こ↓む|。
sdata.e: Reason retires once the unreasonable gets its way.
